seeingstone.desc1: You write an email. A new contact is created automatically. SeeingStone gathers context, remembers dates, and keeps relationships alive, while you shape the message yourself.
seeingstone.desc2: SeeingStone uses algorithmic AI to map every connection across your emails, messages, and documents, revealing hidden connections, patterns, and opportunities.
seeingstone.desc3: Need a collaborator, investor, or domain expert? Query your entire network and surface the right person—fully contextualized and already warm.
seeingstone.desc4: Operate with the clarity of institutions. Never lose touch with people, context, or history, even across years.

velro.desc1: You're flying anyway. Someone else needs to send a package along the same route.
velro.desc2: Velro matches travelers with senders, turning unused luggage space into a fast, trusted delivery channel.
velro.desc3: Velro turns existing travel into a decentralized logistics network, already used by 500 people and growing.
